lines.text: [repeated line]
It's crime-fighting time!
Central Organisation of Police Specialists. Fighting crime in a future time. Protecting Empire City from Big Boss and his gang of crooks.

[in a building being flown over Empire City]
Now I've seen everything!

[looks up and sees the Ultimate Crime Machine]
Let me change that. *Now* I've seen everything!

[at a high-class function]
Something's fishy around here, Chief. And it's not the caviar.
[repeated line]
Freeze! We're cops, and you're under arrest!
[repeated line]
Freeze! We're crooks, and this is a stick-up!
me and my jackhammer!

[using a grappling hook to pull off a heist]
Eeny, Meeny, Miney, Crook. Stealing's a cinch with this new hook!
[repeated line]
Crime's a-wasting!
You got any change?
Yeah, plenty. I just held up a gum machine!

[after Rock Crusher crashes through the roof of his van]
Ever consider using the door, jerk?
[repeated line]
Here's how the caper came down.

[to Mace]
Kiss me, you dumb cop!
What? You never heard of Iceberg lettuce?
Oh, really? I didn't know you can grow that stuff on an iceberg!

[after robbing a bank]
Make sure the reporters spell my name right! It's McBoomBoom. That's one 'Mc' and two Booms.

[mocking BIg Boss]
I want this, I want that! Someday I'm gonna tell Big Boss off!

[referring to his cyborg dog, Blitz]
But there's nothing wrong with having a computer as man's best friend!
I'm innocent! I just got stuck in the mall after closing time!
Tell it to the judge!
Good work, Buzzbomb! Today you've earned your steel wool cupcakes!

[after handcuffing Ms. Demeanor to a parking meter]
Remember to put some change in the meter, Ms. Demeanor.
If you want wrong-doing done right, you have to do it yourself!
Even I keep a promise sometimes.
It's hard to find good crooks these days.

[Berserko has been arrested]
My Cheddar-brained nephew might be a nincompoop, but it makes me look bad if one of my crooks gets caught!

[tryin g on a speed suit]
Oo wee! That thing's plumb too small! I'm sorry but we humans grow big down in Texas

[after stealing some tuxedoes]
We'll be the best-dressed crooks in Empire City!
Bulletproof!
You're very well informed, young lady.
I'm a reporter. I have my sources.
I hope you don't think I'm a pest, but how about an exclusive interview?
One more crack outta you, lady, and I'll give you an exclusive knuckle sandwich!

[Crusher is disguised as a waiter]
Maybe you didn't understand. The lady wants to know what you're serving.
Me? I ain't servin' nothin'! I'm out on parole, see?
Berserko. Rock Crusher. Ms. Demeanor. Turbo Tu-Tone. Dr. Badvibes. Nightshade. Use caution in apprehending.

[dropping gold bars onto Highway]
Pennies from Heaven!
A machine can hand out candy bars, but it sure can't give you justice!
Hey, Uncle Buttons! I've got a present for you!

[spotting the Ultimate Crime Machine on radar]
Now that's what I call a serious bogey!

[referring to one C.O.P.S. file]
The most chaotic caper of our career.
Big job for our first one? Think we can handle it?
We're C.O.P.S. aren't we? We can handle it.
What about you, B.P.? What's your codename going to be?
Yeah. What's B.P. stand for anyway?
I don't know what it used to stand for, but from now on, I'd say it stands for Bulletproof!

Then that's my codename from now on. You all performed splendidly today. I'm proud of you. But as you know, Big Boss and the others got away. And they'll be back. There are many more battles to be fought. But together, one day I promise you, we're going to put the Big Boss behind bars!
Heyt! What are you rookies doing here! Vess told you to stay put!
And miss all the fun?

[after crash landing the Ultimate Crime Machine in the C.O.P.S. parking lot]
Gee, good thing there was a free parking space!
[silence]
No sense of humour.

[at the end of each episode]
Case closed.
There's always a non-violent alternative to resolve conflict.
If you're Captain Crimefighter, then I'm Colonel Crime!
